00039 const u_int32_t NUMBER_BUFFER_LEN = 16;

00041 // Copied from Parameter.cpp
00042 const wchar_t Int8MIMEType[] = L"text/x-calvin-integer-8";
00043 const wchar_t UInt8MIMEType[] = L"text/x-calvin-unsigned-integer-8";
00044 const wchar_t Int16MIMEType[] = L"text/x-calvin-integer-16";
00045 const wchar_t UInt16MIMEType[] = L"text/x-calvin-unsigned-integer-16";
00046 const wchar_t Int32MIMEType[] = L"text/x-calvin-integer-32";
00047 const wchar_t UInt32MIMEType[] = L"text/x-calvin-unsigned-integer-32";
00048 const wchar_t FloatMIMEType[] = L"text/x-calvin-float";
00049 const wchar_t TextMIMEType[] = L"text/plain";
00050 const wchar_t AsciiMIMEType[] = L"text/ascii";

00071 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::ConstructorOfInt8TypeTest()
00072 {
00073         MIMEValue v;
00074         FillMIMEValue(-5, v);
00075         ParameterNameValueType nvt(L"fred", v, Int8MIMEType);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetName() == L"fred");
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueInt8() == -5);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type);
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(nvt.GetValueUInt8(), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::ParameterMismatchException);
00080 }
00081

00083 {

00085         FillMIMEValue(5, v);

00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetName() == L"wilma");
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueUInt8() == 5);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(nvt.GetValueInt8(), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::ParameterMismatchException);

00142         pun.v_float=f;

00144         ParameterNameValueType nvt(L"Henry", v, FloatMIMEType);
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetName() == L"Henry");

00173 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::CopyConstructorTest()
00174 {
00175         MIMEValue v;
00176         float f = 2.34567f;
00177         type_punned pun;
00178         pun.v_float=f;
00179         FillMIMEValue(pun.v_uint32, v);
00180 
00181         ParameterNameValueType nvt(L"Henry", v, FloatMIMEType);
00182         ParameterNameValueType nvtCopy(nvt);
00183         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetName() == L"Henry");
00184         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueFloat() == 2.34567f);
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType);
00186 }

00188 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::AssignmentOperatorTest()
00189 {
00190         MIMEValue v;
00191         ConvertWStringToMIMEText(v, L"Arsenal Football Club");
00192         ParameterNameValueType nvt(L"Viera", v, TextMIMEType);
00193         ParameterNameValueType nvtAssign;
00194         nvtAssign = nvt;
00195 
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetName() == L"Viera");
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueText() == L"Arsenal Football Club");
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::TextType);
00199 }

00201 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::EqualityOperatorTest()
00202 {
00203         MIMEValue v;
00204         ConvertWStringToMIMEText(v, L"Arsenal Football Club");
00205         ParameterNameValueType nvt(L"Viera", v, TextMIMEType);
00206 
00207         MIMEValue v2;
00208         FillMIMEValue(6, v2);
00209         ParameterNameValueType nvtSameName(L"Viera", v2, Int32MIMEType);
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt == nvtSameName);
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt == L"Viera");
00212 }

00214 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::InequalityOperatorTest()
00215 {
00216         MIMEValue v;
00217         ConvertWStringToMIMEText(v, L"Arsenal Football Club");
00218         ParameterNameValueType nvt(L"Viera", v, TextMIMEType);
00219         ParameterNameValueType nvtDifferentName(L"Robben", v, TextMIMEType);
00220         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt != nvtDifferentName);
00221         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt != L"Lampard");
00222 }

00224 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::LessThanOperatorTest()
00225 {
00226         MIMEValue v;
00227         ConvertWStringToMIMEText(v, L"Arsenal Football Club");
00228         ParameterNameValueType nvt(L"Viera", v, TextMIMEType);
00229 
00230         MIMEValue v2;
00231         FillMIMEValue(6, v2);
00232         ParameterNameValueType nvtSameName(L"Viera", v2, Int32MIMEType);
00233         ParameterNameValueType nvtDifferentName(L"Robben", v, TextMIMEType);
00234         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_ASSERTION_FAIL(CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt < nvtSameName));
00235         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvtDifferentName < nvt);
00236 }
00237 
00238 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::GreaterThanOperatorTest()
00239 {
00240         MIMEValue v;
00241         ConvertWStringToMIMEText(v, L"Arsenal Football Club");
00242         ParameterNameValueType nvt(L"Viera", v, TextMIMEType);
00243 
00244         MIMEValue v2;
00245         FillMIMEValue(6, v2);
00246         ParameterNameValueType nvtSameName(L"Viera", v2, Int32MIMEType);
00247         ParameterNameValueType nvtDifferentName(L"Robben", v, TextMIMEType);
00248         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_ASSERTION_FAIL(CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt > nvtSameName));
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt > nvtDifferentName);
00250 }

00402 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::MIMEValueTest()
00403 {
00404         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00405         char buf[4];
00406         buf[0] = 4;
00407         buf[1] = 127;
00408         buf[2] = 88;
00409         buf[3] = 1;
00410         MIMEValue v(buf, 4);
00411 
00412         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(nvt.SetMIMEValue(v));
00413         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetMIMEValue() == v);
00414 }

00416 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::ToStringTest()
00417 {
00418         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00419         nvt.SetName(L"fred");
00420         nvt.SetValueInt8(1);
00421         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"1");
00422         nvt.SetValueUInt8(2);
00423         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"2");
00424         nvt.SetValueInt16(3);
00425         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"3");
00426         nvt.SetValueUInt16(4);
00427         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"4");
00428         nvt.SetValueInt32(5);
00429         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"5");
00430         nvt.SetValueUInt32(6);
00431         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"6");
00432         nvt.SetValueFloat(1015.0f);
00433         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"1015.000000");
00434         nvt.SetValueText(L"test text 16");
00435         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"test text 16");
00436         nvt.SetValueAscii("test text 8");
00437         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"test text 8");
00438 
00439         MIMEValue mimeValue;
00440         mimeValue.SetValue(0, 0);
00441         nvt.SetMIMEType(L"foo");
00442         nvt.SetMIMEValue(mimeValue);
00443         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.ToString() == L"");
00444 }
00445 
00446 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::ConvertWStringToMIMEText(MIMEValue& value, const std::wstring& s)
00447 {
00448         u_int32_t len = (u_int32_t) s.length();
00449         u_int16_t* buf = new u_int16_t[len];
00450         for (u_int32_t i=0; i<len; ++i)
00451         {
00452                 buf[i] = (u_int16_t) s[i];
00453                 buf[i] = htons(buf[i]);
00454         }
00455         value.SetValue(buf, len*sizeof(u_int16_t));
00456         delete[] buf;
00457 }
00458 
00459 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::ConvertStringToMIMEText(MIMEValue& value, const std::string& s)
00460 {
00461         u_int32_t len = (u_int32_t) s.length();
00462         value.SetValue(s.c_str(), len);
00463 }
00464 
00465 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::FillMIMEValue(u_int32_t value, MIMEValue& mime)
00466 {
00467         char buf[NUMBER_BUFFER_LEN];
00468         memset(buf, 0, NUMBER_BUFFER_LEN);      // for aesthetics
00469         value = htonl(value);
00470         memcpy(buf, &value, sizeof(u_int32_t));
00471         mime.SetValue(buf, NUMBER_BUFFER_LEN);
00472 }
00473 
00474 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::testproperties_ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType()
00475 {
00476         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType param;
00477         MIMEValue v;
00478         MIMEValue d;
00479         FillMIMEValue(-5, v);
00480         FillMIMEValue(-10, d);
00481 
00482         param.SetMIMEValue(v);
00483         param.DefaultMIMEValue() = d;
00484         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.DefaultMIMEValue() == d);
00485         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetMIMEValue() == v);
00486 
00487         param.RequiredFlag() = true;
00488         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.RequiredFlag() == true);
00489 
00490         param.RequiredFlag() = false;
00491         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.RequiredFlag() == false);
00492 }
00493 
00494 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::testconstructors_ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType()
00495 {
00496         int32_t v1=-5;
00497         int32_t d1=-10;
00498         MIMEValue v;
00499         MIMEValue d;
00500         v.SetValue(&v1, sizeof(v1));
00501         d.SetValue(&d1, sizeof(d1));
00502         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType p1(L"fred", v, Int32MIMEType, d, true);
00503         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p1.DefaultMIMEValue() == d);
00504         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p1.GetMIMEValue() == v);
00505         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p1.RequiredFlag() == true);
00506 
00507         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType p2(L"fred", &v1, sizeof(int32_t), Int32MIMEType, &d1, sizeof(int32_t), false);
00508         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p2.DefaultMIMEValue() == d);
00509         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p2.GetMIMEValue() == v);
00510         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p2.RequiredFlag() == false);
00511 }
00512 
00513 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::testassignment_ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType()
00514 {
00515         MIMEValue v;
00516         MIMEValue d;
00517         FillMIMEValue(-5, v);
00518         FillMIMEValue(-10, d);
00519         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType p1(L"fred", v, Int8MIMEType, d, true);
00520 
00521         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType p2 = p1;
00522         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType p3;
00523         p3 = p2;
00524 
00525         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p3.GetMIMEValue() == p1.GetMIMEValue());
00526         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p3.DefaultMIMEValue() == p1.DefaultMIMEValue());
00527         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p3.GetMIMEValue() == p1.GetMIMEValue());
00528         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(p3.RequiredFlag() == p1.RequiredFlag());
00529 }
00530 
00531 void ParameterNameValueTypeTest::testToString_ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType()
00532 {
00533         ParameterNameValueDefaultRequiredType nvt;
00534 
00535         nvt.SetName(L"fred");
00536         nvt.SetValueInt8(10);
00537         nvt.SetDefaultValueInt8(1);
00538         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"1");
00539         nvt.SetValueUInt8(12);
00540         nvt.SetDefaultValueUInt8(2);
00541         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"2");
00542         nvt.SetValueInt16(13);
00543         nvt.SetDefaultValueInt16(3);
00544         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"3");
00545         nvt.SetValueUInt16(14);
00546         nvt.SetDefaultValueUInt16(4);
00547         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"4");
00548         nvt.SetValueInt32(15);
00549         nvt.SetDefaultValueInt32(5);
00550         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"5");
00551         nvt.SetValueUInt32(16);
00552         nvt.SetDefaultValueUInt32(6);
00553         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"6");
00554         nvt.SetValueFloat(15.0f);
00555         nvt.SetDefaultValueFloat(1015.0f);
00556         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"1015.000000");
00557         nvt.SetValueText(L"test text 16b");
00558         nvt.SetDefaultValueText(L"test text 16");
00559         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"test text 16");
00560         nvt.SetValueAscii("test text 8b");
00561         nvt.SetDefaultValueAscii("test text 8");
00562         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"test text 8");
00563 
00564         MIMEValue mimeValue;
00565         mimeValue.SetValue(0, 0);
00566         nvt.SetMIMEType(L"foo");
00567         nvt.DefaultMIMEValue() = mimeValue;
00568         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.DefaultToString() == L"");
00569 }
